mutants.code:
def count_qualified_teams(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, scores) = case
        scores.sort(reverse=True)
        qualifying_score = scores[K + 1]
        qualified_teams = sum((1 for score in scores if score >= qualifying_score))
        results.append(qualified_teams)
    return results

    return results

mutants.code:
def count_qualified_teams(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, scores) = case
        scores.sort(reverse=True)
        qualifying_score = scores[K - 1]
        qualified_teams = sum((1 for score in scores if score == qualifying_score))
        results.append(qualified_teams)
    return results
